message: Is anybody planning on participating in the django dash next weekend?
I'm thinking about it, if I can come up with something worth building.
Yeah, ideas are the hard part. Some with small enough scope to execute well in the time but significant enough to matter after.
exactly.  I wish I had thought of it sooner.  I think registrations are ending today.  Gives me plenty of time to think of something cool for next year I guess.
The KC group should definitely compete next year. The contest has been moved back to July 30 - 31, 2011 fwiw.

It's worth mentioning that the dash has been re-opened through midnight tomorrow - http://djangodash.com/registration/ No excuses, there should be a KC team at least building an app with a site to demonstrate it.
Hmm. Two hours to go. Anybody crazy enough to form a team with me and figure something out before then? :)
Or, I guess we have more time than that: http://twitter.com/#!/djangodash/status/92008706513977344
